hooks.command: blocked=false; for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do case "$f" in *.env|*.env.*|*credentials*|*secret*|*.key|*.pem) blocked=true; break;; esac; done; if $blocked; then echo 'BLOCK: Refusing to edit sensitive file (*.env, credentials, secrets, keys, certs). Ask user for confirmation first.'; exit 1; fi; exit 0
has_go=false; for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do case "$f" in *.go) has_go=true; break;; esac; done; if $has_go; then gofumpt -l -w $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>/dev/null; fi; true

blocked=false; for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do case "$f" in */go.sum|*/default.pgo|*/node_modules/*|*/website/build/*) blocked=true; break;; esac; done; if $blocked; then echo 'BLOCK: Do not edit generated/vendored files (go.sum, default.pgo, node_modules/, website/build/)'; exit 1; fi; exit 0

for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do case "$f" in *.go) if ! head -1 "$f" | grep -q 'SPDX-License-Identifier'; then tmp=$(mktemp) && { echo '// SPDX-License-Identifier: MPL-2.0'; echo ''; cat "$f"; } > "$tmp" && mv "$tmp" "$f"; fi;; esac; done; true
for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do case "$f" in *.d2) if command -v d2 >/dev/null 2>&1; then d2 fmt "$f" 2>/dev/null; fi;; esac; done; true
for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do case "$f" in *.cue) if command -v cue >/dev/null 2>&1; then cue fmt "$f" 2>/dev/null; fi;; esac; done; true

has_schema=false; for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do case "$f" in *_schema.cue|*/pkg/invowkfile/*|*/pkg/invowkmod/*|*/internal/config/types.go) has_schema=true; break;; esac; done; if $has_schema; then echo 'CUE schema or Go struct changed. Run sync tests: go test -v -run Sync ./pkg/invowkfile/ ./pkg/invowkmod/ ./internal/config/'; fi; true

has_website=false; for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do case "$f" in */website/*) has_website=true; break;; esac; done; if $has_website; then cd website 2>/dev/null && npm run build --silent 2>&1 | tail -5; fi; true
echo 'If you made any changes this session (code, config, docs, workflows, rules, skills, hooks, etc.), run /learn before finishing to check for stale CLAUDE.md, rules, or skills.'
